results.title: The Icarus wish
results.brief_description: The awe of flight, the wonder of a bird, the freedom of riding a current of air. Multiple screen images condense the emotions of two boys of different cultures. A jet liner, a bird, a kite and a paper airplane are the segments of this non-verbal adventure in visual literacy.

results.title: The Hydrogen atom as viewed by quantum mechanics
results.creator_credit: J. Arthur Campbell, David W. Ridgway and Davidson Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Chemical Education Material Study Series”.
The model for the electron probability distribution in the hydrogen atom is provided by quantum mechanics. Confidence in this model is justified because the calculated energies agree closely with the experimental energies obtained from the hydrogen atom spectrum. The probability distribution of the electron is demonstrated by analogies. Animation shows the outstanding features of the hydrogen atom.

results.title: The Hydraulic brake system
results.creator_credit: United States. Office of Education and Century Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Automobile Maintenance”.
Illustrates how to check brake pedal travel; examine the brake lining; adjust thebrake shoes; inspect shoes; inspect and adjust the hydraulic fluid system - taking care of minor problems prevents major problems.

results.title: The Hydra
results.creator_credit: Percy Smith, Julian Huxley and Gaumont-British Instructional
results.brief_description: The first part of this film studies the natural surroundings of the hydra, and the structure of the organism and the second part focuses on the process of regeneration after bisection, the manner in which food is caught and digested, sexual reproduction by eggs and sperm, and a sexual reproduction by budding.

results.title: The Hustler
results.creator_credit: Robert Rossen and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Paul Newman is Fast Eddie Felson, the fastest-talking, sharpest-shooting pool shark in town. The film traces his struggle to gain the World Championship from the reigning pool king, Minnesota Fats (Jackie Gleason). Newman’s Fast Eddie symbolises the struggle of the down-and-out in America. The film features exceptional black and white photography (the cinematography won an Academy Award), and a witty, literate script based on the novel by Walter Tevis.

results.title: The Hurricane
results.brief_description: A wonderful film for its time, particularly in the special effects area. The plot has it all - romance and passion, heroes and traitors, adventure and devastation, climaxing with an epic disaster of the natural kind in the form of a hurricane. Based on the novel by Charles Nordhoff and James Norman Hall, adapted by Oliver H.P. Garrett, with screenplay by Dudley Nichols, “The Hurricane” is set on the French colonised island Manakoora in the South Seas ruled by the cold and ruthless Governor Eugene De Laage (Raymond Massey) along with his kind-hearted and sensitive wife, Madame Germaine De Laage (Mary Astor). However the main characters of the story are the island chief’s daughter Marama (Dorothy Lamour) and her handsome hero husband, Terangi (John Hall) who is wrongly jailed whilst visiting in Tahiti. With Terangi’s escape and bid to return to his wife and his island home the story takes on an intensity that finally erupts into a breath-taking and havoc-wreaking finale. A classic film with a cast including C. Aubrey Smith, Thomas Mitchell, John Carradine and Jerome Cowan.

results.title: The Hurricane
results.creator_credit: Norman Jewison, Armyan Bernstein, John Ketcham and Azoff Films
results.brief_description: Denzel Washington stars in this true life story of Rubin “Hurricane” Carter, a top ranking boxing champion many people thought would be the next world champion. One night on leaving a nightclub with a fellow patron, he is pulled up by the police and accused of murdering 3 people. Despite professing his innocence and a lack of police evidence as well as motive, Carter is given 3 consecutive life sentences in prison. What was very clear to some was that this was a case based on racism and revenge, resting in the mind of a disturbed police officer who had it in for Rubin since he was 11. Having twice had his appeal and right to a re-trial turned down, it is not until Rubin receives a letter from Lesra that his luck and life begins to change. Lesra discovers a copy of “The Sixteenth round”, a book written by Rubin, in a second hand book store. Reading the book inspires the youngster, who, along with the help of three friends decides to devote their time and money to getting Rubin a fair trial. Denzel Washington received an Oscar nomination for best Actor at the 1999 Academy Awards for his excellent portrayal of Rubin “Hurricane” Carter.

results.title: The Hurdles
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Track and Field Instruction”.
Hurdling explained and demonstrated, aided by stop action and slow motion sequences. Includes training exercises for athletes and training procedure for both high and low hurdling being practised under the direction of a coach.
